items.title: Caterpillar Inc. (CAT): Among the Best Stocks to Buy According to Bill Gates
items.description: We recently compiled a list of the 10 Best Stocks to Buy According to Bill Gates. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Caterpillar Inc. (NYSE:CAT) stands against the other stocks. Bill Gates is one of the most influential figures in the modern world. The software company he co-founded, best known [â€¦]
